overview: On a futuristic plantation where fruits are genetically enhanced with animal DNA, farmer Garrett Kelly and his android farm hand ADAM desperately fight to hide their trade secrets from competitors. When his nephew threatens to sell the farm and use the money to leave the planet with his fianc√©, Garrett ponders more drastic measures.
tagline: The race to engineer a flawless animal/fruit hybrid has come to an end. Kelly farms has patented a technology to produce sweeter, juicier and longer-lasting specimens. And now, everyone wants a piece...
title: Future Farmer
